QueryDefinition.Query: select staffid as PROVIDER_ID, cast(Right(cast(staffid as varchar), 3) as int) as CARE_SITE_ID, cast(staffid as varchar) as PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, l.text as SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE, cast(coalesce(role, 0) as varchar) as SPECIALTY_SOURCE_KEY, coalesce(gender, 0) as gender, case when coalesce(gender, 0) = 1 then 8507 when coalesce(gender, 0) = 2 then 8532 else 0 end as gender_concept_id from {sc}.Staff s JOIN {sc}.lookup l ON s.role = l.code AND lookup_type_id = 76
